field.name: summary
field.value: Using UrlHelper in action called with ActionHelper casues an exception

field.name: description
field.value:
ActionHelper creates a new MonoRail request but supplies UrlInfo without AppVirtualDir set. This causes a NullPointerException in UrlBuilder#CreateUrlPartsBuilder method.
Attached is a unit test showing the issue.
I suppose replacing the UrlInfo constructor used by ActionHelper should be enough to resolve this. I'm not sure where to get correct paramters though

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: MonoRail2 is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/MonoRail/issues
